Author: jl777c#5810
Content: @Alright I think once sapling is integrated into PIRATE, we can add a rule that converts from old form to transparent. that will create a lot of transparent, but the first time it is used, it needs to go back into sapling mode. the change can be added the same place I added the notary exemption and so when new notaries are added, we can add support for old -> tx, assuming that all new z transactions are sapling

Content: not anything to worry about

I guess the mining pool might hit some bottlenecks where there are hundreds of miners... but the payouts can just be batched every 3 hours or whatever is needed to be able to keep up
